mapper.select: select rnum, ARTIST_NUM, ARTIST_NAME, ARTIST_IMG , FOLLOWER, I.ARTINFO_NUM, I.ARTINFO_IMG from ( select rnum, ARTIST_NUM, ARTIST_NAME, ARTIST_IMG , FOLLOWER from ( select rownum rnum, G.* from ( SELECT A.ARTIST_NUM, A.ARTIST_NAME, A.ARTIST_IMG , nvl(F.FOLLOWER, 0) FOLLOWER FROM ARTIST A LEFT OUTER JOIN (select ARTIST_NUM, COUNT(ARTIST_NUM) FOLLOWER from ARTIST_FOLLOWER group by ARTIST_NUM) F ON A.ARTIST_NUM=F.ARTIST_NUM WHERE A.ARTIST_NUM IN(SELECT A.ARTIST_NUM FROM ARTIST A LEFT OUTER JOIN ARTIST_FOLLOWER M ON A.ARTIST_NUM = M.ARTIST_NUM WHERE M.ID = #{userId}) ORDER BY FOLLOWER DESC, ARTIST_NUM ASC ) G ) H where rnum>=#{startRnum} and rnum<=#{endRnum} ) J LEFT OUTER JOIN ART_INFO I using (ARTIST_NUM) order by artist_num
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ARTIST_FOLLOWER WHERE ARTIST_NUM=#{artistNum} AND ID=#{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT A.ARTIST_NUM, A.ARTIST_NAME,A.ARTIST_IMG, I.ARTINFO_NUM, I.ARTINFO_IMG, COUNT(F.ARTIST_NUM) FOLLOWER FROM ARTIST A LEFT OUTER JOIN ART_INFO I ON A.ARTIST_NUM=I.ARTIST_NUM LEFT OUTER JOIN ARTIST_FOLLOWER F ON A.ARTIST_NUM=F.ARTIST_NUM WHERE ARTIST_NAME like '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%' OR ARTIST_IMG like '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%' GROUP BY A.ARTIST_NUM, A.ARTIST_NAME, A.ARTIST_IMG, I.ARTINFO_NUM, I.ARTINFO_IMG ORDER BY ARTIST_NUM, FOLLOWER DESC
